MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-MAR-2021 14:52.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL75 postcode area of Pentraeth affecting properties in Nant Y Felin, Maes Geraint and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:52pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:21pm on March 31, 2021
